archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0787
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I am able to see statistics about my customers like average contract term (if any), time with Vodafone, average monthly spend, data/voice/txt usage

properties.value: REP: How the required data should be provided on BSS side ? available for user on system screens? database level ? particular report/export ? (if Yes - what format is required/expected ?)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
